extendedInfo.description: Can you see the flashing wheel next to the panda? Do you know what is it? Yes, that is the magical kaleidoscope.   Oh, no! The door is locked again by the cute panda! If kids want to successfully move to the beautiful garden through the house, they will have to find the same five items which are hidden in the house to get the pass. Come on little explorers, letâs find them.  When babies arrive at the beautiful garden, they need to decorate their garden by themselves. Please move your finger to drag the decorations on the roof and release them on the points which are on the grass. Amazing effects will come out immediately.  The magical and amazing kaleidoscope will bring a lot of fun and surprises for your kid.
